home.parrafo-info: I am a full stack developer with experience in Front-End technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I have Back-End skills in Java, Node.js, and databases like MySQL. I also have knowledge in agile development methodologies and an intermediate level of English. My professional objective is to continue growing and developing in the field of computer science..

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi: I am a Systems Engineering student and also studied Full-Stack Web Development. As a professional, my goal is to establish a career in the world of Web Development, where I can gain new experience and knowledge, as well as continue to strengthen my professional profile. I am an enthusiastic and empathetic person, with skills focused on teamwork, assertive communication, problem solving, responsibility, and proactivity. I enjoy learning from others and am constantly seeking ways to improve myself. I am confident that I can bring value to any team and I am eager to continue growing as a professional in the world of Web Development..

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: game in which the user must guess a secret word in a limited number of attempts. The word is randomly selected by the program and the user will lose the game if the gallows image is completed.
proyectos.info-proyecto2: My personal web portfolio, where you can find some of my most outstanding projects, my technical skills and a little about my training.
proyectos.info-proyecto3: An encryptor where the user can write a text and the encryptor encodes it with already programmed keys. The encryptor also allows you to decrypt the text.
